front.title: Echo Request/Reply for Enabled In-situ OAM Capabilities

abstract.t: This document describes an extension to the echo request/reply mechanisms used in IPv6 (including Segment Routing with IPv6 data plane (SRv6)), MPLS (including Segment Routing with MPLS data plane (SR-MPLS)), Service Function Chain (SFC) and Bit Index Explicit Replication (BIER) environments, which can be used within the In situ Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (IOAM) domain, allowing the IOAM encapsulating node to discover the enabled IOAM capabilities of each IOAM transit and IOAM decapsulating node.
